scripts.tailwind:watch: cross-env TAILWIND_MODE=watch cross-env NODE_ENV=development postcss src/styles/tailwind.css -o src/styles/tailwind-output.css -w
scripts.tailwind:build: cross-env TAILWIND_MODE=build cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss src/styles/tailwind.css -o src/styles/tailwind-output.css
scripts.build: npm run tailwind:build && npm run build:only
